00049 void gpsInfoPrint(void)
00050 {
00051 
00052     rprintfProgStrM("TOW:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.TimeOfWeek.f);          rprintfCRLF();
00053     rprintfProgStrM("WkNum:    ");  rprintfNum(10,4,0,' ',GpsInfo.WeekNum);         rprintfCRLF();
00054     rprintfProgStrM("UTCoffset:");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.UtcOffset.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00055     rprintfProgStrM("Num SVs:  ");  rprintfNum(10,4,0,' ',GpsInfo.numSVs);          rprintfCRLF();
00056 
00057     rprintfProgStrM("X_ECEF:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.x.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00058     rprintfProgStrM("Y_ECEF:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.y.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00059     rprintfProgStrM("Z_ECEF:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.z.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00060     rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosECEF.TimeOfFix.f);   rprintfCRLF();
00061     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.PosECEF.updates); rprintfCRLF();
00062 
00063     //u08 str[20];
00064     //rprintfProgStrM(" PosLat: ");     rprintfStr(dtostrf(GpsInfo.PosLat.f, 10, 5, str));
00065 //  rprintfProgStrM("PosLat:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, 180*(GpsInfo.PosLLA.lat.f/PI)); rprintfCRLF();
00066 //  rprintfProgStrM("PosLon:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, 180*(GpsInfo.PosLLA.lon.f/PI)); rprintfCRLF();
00067     rprintfProgStrM("PosLat:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosLLA.lat.f);          rprintfCRLF();
00068     rprintfProgStrM("PosLon:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosLLA.lon.f);          rprintfCRLF();
00069     rprintfProgStrM("PosAlt:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosLLA.alt.f);          rprintfCRLF();
00070     rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.PosLLA.TimeOfFix.f);    rprintfCRLF();
00071     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.PosLLA.updates);  rprintfCRLF();
00072 
00073     rprintfProgStrM("Vel East: ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.east.f);         rprintfCRLF();
00074     rprintfProgStrM("Vel North:");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.north.f);        rprintfCRLF();
00075     rprintfProgStrM("Vel Up:   ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.up.f);           rprintfCRLF();
00076 //  rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelENU.TimeOfFix.f);    rprintfCRLF();
00077     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.VelENU.updates);  rprintfCRLF();
00078 
00079     rprintfProgStrM("Vel Head: ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelHS.heading.f);       rprintfCRLF();
00080     rprintfProgStrM("Vel Speed:");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelHS.speed.f);         rprintfCRLF();
00081 //  rprintfProgStrM("TOF:      ");  rprintfFloat(8, GpsInfo.VelHS.TimeOfFix.f); rprintfCRLF();
00082     rprintfProgStrM("Updates:  ");  rprintfNum(10,6,0,' ',GpsInfo.VelHS.updates);   rprintfCRLF();
00083 
00084 }
